website_summaries.verdict: This product is designed to turn any cooler into a floatable and towable cooler.
pros: Float allows you to use your own cooler
Allows you to enjoy the insulation of a regular cooler and the convenience of a float
cons: This is made to float a smaller  28-quart cooler
Other models will not fit as well in the float

customer_reviews.title: River tubing? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: This is fantastic! My husband used this recently on a river tubing trip and it fit the cooler better than the ones they had there. The mesh is very strong and held up better than the actual rafts themselves. I originally bought this for our dog to be able to hang with us while we are in the pool or tubing. She is usually afraid of things like this, but after a bit of coaxing (and a lot of treats) she got in herself. This also has 4 cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love this float!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great! Holds my cooler like a champ and keeps my beverages nice and close by. I use this on the ocean in a bay while floating around on hot days. Haven't tested it in rougher water. It does exactly what i need it to and everyone was very impressed. The only drawback is the air input/output is huge, you can't just blow this up with your mouth. So if you don't have a pump with a large opening, then you will have a hard time. I think a simple valve that you can blow up with your mouth would suffice as it doesn't take a lot of air!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: BEST FLOAT COOLER POSSIBLE! Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.text: Used this on the Yakima river in WA and it worked perfectly. We surrounded the cooler float with our tubes so everyone could get at the cooler easily. We strapped a waterproof speaker to it and a trash bag and was set for the river. Never tipped, never ripped, stayed filled with air more then our tubes did. Kept the beers and flasks cold till the end (5hr float ride), and had ice to spare. For the price you can't beat this deal, plus it is super easy to blow up and seal the air hole.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler V

customer_reviews.title: We can't live without it and use it every weekend!
customer_reviews.text: We have a boat and use this every weekend out in the river. This is our 2nd one and the first one lasted about 3 years. I got the 1st one from Walmart on sale for $5. After the 1st one died I tried to find another one and no one had them including Amazon. A friend bought me another kind but it only had 2 cup holders. When I saw these were available I jumped at the chance to get it. Our cooler is now right in the water with us, where it is supposed to be! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen J Adsit

customer_reviews.title: Survived the Frio
customer_reviews.text: Used it to haul a RTIC soft sided cooler worked well for that purpose and got it caught a few times but despite the extra tension pulled on it it survive several floats over a weeks period
customer_reviews.author: Lonestar

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler float
customer_reviews.text: This float works great with my roto molded 26 qt cooler. It supported the weight and kept everything up right and level. Moderate waves did not upset it and it was easy to pull around behind a lounge raft.
customer_reviews.author: Backpackcamp

customer_reviews.title: Great for river tubing
customer_reviews.text: Used it on July 4th for river tubing. It was great. Well with the price. Also used it for my little dog the next day —just put a towel in it and launched it..dog and I enjoyed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. It states that it will hold a coleman ...
customer_reviews.text: This cooler float held up a 30 lb igloo playmate cooler no problem with room to spare for an even larger cooler! Very satisfied. It states that it will hold a coleman cooler 48 quart. Highly recommend. Easy to inflate with a standard foot pump used for tubes for boats. Seems durable as well. have not used the can holders though, so cannot comment on that, however the holders seem small. I have used this several times on sandbar walk abouts with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good for pets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I actually use them as dog floats upside down and my dogs enjoy them. They allow for their stomach to be in the water but the rest of them to stay dry. I have 3 dachshunds and they range from 30lbs to 12lbs and they all fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: If you spend a lot of time anchored off in your boat, and drinking beer in the water, this is a must. Get it, you'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: BigBluRvrCat

customer_reviews.title: I have not had a chance to use it yet
customer_reviews.text: I have inflated it, and i think it is going to be great. I wish they would not push for feedback before I have had a chance to try it.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: Super stable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This cooler float was a Perfect Fit for a smaller Igloo cooler. We used it during a slow river float and it worked like a charm. It was super stable, easy to inflate, and fit my cooler well. It worked better than the blow up coolers my friends used which had inflatable lids with poor seals. They were soon filled with river water whereas this float kept the cooler right by our side, out of the water, and free of water.
customer_reviews.author: Trevelar

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Although if you don't have a tube of the same brand, the rope Wil almost definitely come untied and you have to watch your cooler, beer, snacks, phone, and car keys float away without you. Thank goodness the guys that pulled it over were honest and didn't steal anything!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great float for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great little cooler floaty for our ice chest on river floats, lake days, etc. Quick and easy to blow up and fits lots of small coolers.
customer_reviews.author: Elyse D

customer_reviews.title: Price is a bit much
customer_reviews.text: Love this float, only bad thing is I paid $12 for the last one and now they are $20.
customer_reviews.author: cdg

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product
customer_reviews.text: This float cooler holder is great, I put an old Colman cooler in it and have taken it down the river for 3 years no slow leaking air. It’s still like new durable. Be carful in rapids it can roll over and loose all your ice. Make sure there is something to keep lid closed, but other than that this is great. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great for tubing adventures
customer_reviews.text: We took this on a tubing trip down a river with some pretty big riffles. This float was the real MVP. It held our cooler upright the entire time. The only reason I removed a star is because the rope came untied from both ends and we needed to use different rope to attach to our tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Caporaso

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I live in Austin, Texas so I'm very close to all of the river rat attractions. As long as your cooler fits the dimensions of the tube, this little green beauty can be the perfect water-friendly essential to a great lazy river float. You might want to look into bringing extra rope/ tether cord because what is supplied might be too short or difficult to tie to other tubes depending on the kind of waters that you plan to use it in. I've never had a big problem, though :) Great buy. I even have 2 for the larger party situations.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Dalton

customer_reviews.title: I inflated it when I bought it and it's still pretty firm a week later
customer_reviews.text: Initial opinion is positive. I inflated it when I bought it and it's still pretty firm a week later. Perfect fit for my cooler. Attachment hooks are useless to me but convenient if you have other tubes with this system. This float's first official river trial will be coming soon and I'll update my review if I have any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Pet or cooler works for both.
customer_reviews.text: Thicker plastic around the inside and sides to accommodate scrapes and scuffs. Mesh interior floor for cooler to sit on. Valve is kinda weird. Good purchase tho. We use it for Lola our Pomeranian to float around in the pool. Pet floats are incredibly overpriced but $10 isn't bad.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously had doubts.... it was so lightweight and semi flimsy looking. But we aired it up tossed it in the water, and I drug over a cooler filled to the brim with beer and water. 25 lbs? . I plopped it in fully expecting the whole load to sink, but the float didn't even budge, and held that cooler up for hours like a champ. This was by far the best money we've spent. Perfect for our floating fishing trips!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: Brought this along for a 3-4 hour river float with a relatively heavy Coleman plastic cooler on top. Stayed afloat over rocks and rapids - no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: A User

customer_reviews.title: We love this and use it for floating snacks and drinks ...
customer_reviews.text: We love this and use it for floating snacks and drinks when we're in our pool - exactly what I was looking for! The only suggestion would be if they also included an insert to block the water coming up through the mesh.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: It kept our cooler afloat while on many float trips ...
customer_reviews.text: It kept our cooler afloat while on many float trips last summer. Never popped even though we hit every rock in, on, and around that forsaken lake.
customer_reviews.author: WAM

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This float worked great the first time it was used. On the second time we used it, it started to deflate before we even got on the water. It was kinda a waste of money to only be able to use it once!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the frio
customer_reviews.text: This float is perfect. It has encountered many tree stumps and rocks and small falls. It never loses air and never tips. Works great for a variety of cooler sizes.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pool

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: The cooler fit perfectly in the tube. It worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eccles

customer_reviews.title: Not A Bad Buy
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad buy. I've used it several times. It holds my cooler filled with ice and a case of beer. I've tubed down the river and not once did it attempt to flip over.
customer_reviews.author: Rv0214

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we were going tubing and I don't regret it at all. It was able to hold our 30 qt. Igloo cooler with no problem. I was worried it wouldn't be able to stand up to the weight of the cooler, ice, and drinks but it did great!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Tubin' with the Redneck Yacht Club
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! It worked so well the next day I ordered another one. I couldn't really figure out the rope tabs attached but we really didn't need them. I ordered the second one so I can tie them together and have a space in the middle for a trash bag or a dry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Angelia J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Floatie
customer_reviews.text: Great Floating Device. The only thing I didn't like and wished I had known or that was different was that the bottom is mesh and therefore doesn't keep things dry as I intended it for belongings with could get more or less, rather less, wet.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Held a cooler full of Ice, Drinks, Hoagies on a day of river-tubing (not white-water). The
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Deflated from a weak seal around the edge. Lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: Deflated from a weak seal around the edge. Lasted maybe 2 hours. Patched it to make it through the weekend then trashed it. Shame coz it was neat having it and my cooler floating down the River.
customer_reviews.author: Antony Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Dog Raft
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted this for her small dog and it is a perfect dog raft. She added a small foam square so the dog doesn't get as wet.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole p.

customer_reviews.title: It's a good size, and strong to hold a cooler for ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this value! It's a good size, and strong to hold a cooler for two.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller then I thought but it works for a small cooler
customer_reviews.author: olly2015

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pulls along behind a kayak with ice chest in it very easily
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Sevylor Cooler I have bought for our yearly Float trips. It has even been used as a float in an emergency situation. Very durable, and can hold significant weight above water.
customer_reviews.author: Ravens2012

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Used this on a tubing trip (calm water), anchored it to another tube, and it worked great. What more is there to say? Totally worth it at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: great for lake
customer_reviews.text: great for lake. not using for a cooler, but rather to hold my kindle, my drink, sunglasses, etc when I have to jump off the floatie and get wet.
customer_reviews.author: speck

customer_reviews.title: Actually got this for my little 6 pound guy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Actually got this for my little 6 pound guy to use in the lake. So far has held up to little claws hanging on!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M

customer_reviews.title: Has worked great for multiple trips down the Salt River in AZ
customer_reviews.text: Has worked great for multiple trips down the Salt River in AZ, without tipping or deflating! We've always had a pump that worked for it (it's not a "special" pump, per say, just a basic tube pump), but important to note that lung power will probably not help you make this seaworthy. So if you're bring a pump to help inflate your float tubes, you're in business. Would recommend forgoing the cup holders unless you really like the taste of river water though.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Collison

customer_reviews.title: This is our second one and it fits our cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one and it fits our cooler perfectly and is our companion while floating on the lake!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great price and it worked great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and it worked great. I wish we would have had the right sized cooler to fit in the space, but i didn't check that before ordering. We made it work though. I would recommend this. A lot of other cooler tubes are really expensive, this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of tubing and typically rent a tube for our ice chest ($10 a float). I got this for my boyfriend and it has been perfect. Used it twice already, once with a small soft cooler and again with a full size cooler that's intended to fit this float. We tied them both to the float and when we went over a rapid they both stayed tied in. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Boatman

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for the purpose of giving my little handicapped dog a floaty for the pool. Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this weekend and love it! Material is very durable and holds the cooler and ice with no problem. Cup holders are nice for holding additional snack cups for chips and cookies.
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Florida girl approved! River, pool, beach... you name it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little float! I have a Sevylor lounge chair and this little life saver hooks right on. Used this on a recent tubing trip as a holder for small cooler, my portable waterproof speaker, and my small dry box. No more trying to hold everything in my lap! The quality is very good...it seems strudy and well made. I will continue to use this for river tubing trips as well as in the pool and at the beach. If it ever breaks, which I don't see happening any time soon, I will surely by another at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Great product to keep you in the water.
customer_reviews.text: Fun way to stay and play! Holds the cooler perfectly and the cup holders are nice to have for people swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Fishing float tube
customer_reviews.text: We tried to pull this on our kayak and it lasted for about 2 hrs. Maybe it would be ok floating in a pool with nothing in it. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect to float down the river with a cooler on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ajones

customer_reviews.title: Idea behind it is cool but ultimately the end product was flat (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: Item came with a huge hole in it. Idea behind it is cool but ultimately the end product was flat (pun intended)
customer_reviews.author: Trader Jade

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Survived one trip down a shallow river (which means lots of rocks). Fairly impressed with the little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cooler tote
customer_reviews.text: Havent used it yet but I am sure it will work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler float. Works well w my cooler..igloo brand w 2 wheels and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Luce

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying for float trips!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for float trips. For long fishing trips it is like dragging an anchor and makes it hards to track straight so be prepared for a work out especially for kayaks.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Handy for towing behind Kayak's to handle cooler or fishing gear, good price, fash shipping
customer_reviews.text: great for pulling behind our kayaks, for cooler, fishing gear etc
customer_reviews.author: ndavicourt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Holds cooler nicely. I tow it behind my kayak for storing my blue crabs
customer_reviews.author: William Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to float the river
customer_reviews.text: Perfect float for the River or Lake. Fits Coleman 28 QT perfectly
customer_reviews.author: RN4you

customer_reviews.title: Not the sturdiest of cooler floats.
customer_reviews.text: This popped way too easily. At least I didn't pay too much for it.
customer_reviews.author: JennFromTX

customer_reviews.title: Much better than an inflatable cooler
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly. Much better than an inflatable cooler. Used it on the river and was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Top heavy with a loaded cooler
customer_reviews.text: We lost several beers after the float tipped over. Maybe ok for a pool but not the lake or river.
customer_reviews.author: charles corley

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 of these, and they both only ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these, and they both only lasted 1/2 of the trip before popping or deflating. The first one was due to a sharp object, but the second one didn't even make it into the water.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick A.

customer_reviews.title: Lazy coving at it's best
customer_reviews.text: Great for coving . Have bought 2. Mi It's have correct size cooler .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Kava

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Able to load up a 28 quart ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Able to load up a 28 quart cooler with ice and drinks and it stays afloat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Cooler fit perfectly and it lasted the whole river trip.
customer_reviews.author: amazonabby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the cooler and my 5-year old daughter who used it as a raft.
customer_reviews.author: kalena

customer_reviews.title: and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical how well this would work, but was pleasantly surprised. We towed a heavy cooler down a river with small rapids, sometimes dragging it over shallow rocks, and it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The mesh bottom makes this float the best one out there!
customer_reviews.author: Christine T.

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler float
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler float!! Very easy to blow up and did great on our trip. Would buy it again if I needed another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome device
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my ice chest right next to me in the pool
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. We can put our cooler in this and the ice doesn't melt. We had a floating blow up cooler and the ice melted really quick!! Love this
customer_reviews.author: Jayne

customer_reviews.title: Puppy love
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 lb toy poodle. He loves floating in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Liza M.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I've made for the boat
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I've made for the boat. Easily tethers to the tow line so we can have the bevs right there in the water with us.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it really does hold a cooler full of beverages. worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: This float looks nice and held my cooler fine but it didn't last ...
customer_reviews.text: This float looks nice and held my cooler fine but it didn't last through my second trip on the lake with it before deflating. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Antonia Ginette Vultaggio

customer_reviews.title: Small and thin plastic
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is WAY smaller than it looks on the page and does not fit any standard coolers in the middle holding spot. It's advertised as a cooler float but make sure you have a very small cooler for this or it is not going to fit. The plastic is very thing and cheap compared to other floats I have used in the past. I'm not sure If I would be to willing to just put all my drinks in this and let it float behind the raft because it seems like it would pop pretty easily!
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has wrong color listed but photo is correct color
customer_reviews.text: Color on the site said blue. Photo is green and product is green
customer_reviews.author: antonio prieto jr

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Our heavy cooler never sank
customer_reviews.text: My cooler was to big for it to fit so we placed it on top and and tied it down with rope. Worked great. Our heavy cooler never sank!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bauer

customer_reviews.title: best cooler floaties
customer_reviews.text: These are the best cooler floaties on the market. We have tried many brands but these ones survive summer after summer. We use them to float on the river for hours through rapids and they are able to withstand. Hold midsize cooler perfectly or 2 small coolers. Stabilize coolers from tipping also.
customer_reviews.author: RNmom

customer_reviews.title: Tips over if you don't put beverages in it.
customer_reviews.text: It's small, so it can hold cans or bottles but it will tip over easily if you don't have a lot of beverages holding it down. It attaches to your raft so it will follow you. The bottom is mesh so the water will keep the beverages cold if the water is colder than your beverages, otherwise if you want your beverages ice-cold then putting them in the pool wouldn't be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: great float
customer_reviews.text: works great for tubing and we love using it. The river we tube goes from deep to shallow and this does get hung up on the rocks a bit. We usually get about two seasons out of one before buying a new one. That is the only reason for four stars and not 5. Just wish it was a little stronger but we still enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: GIMMY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it floats and holds beer. would give 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: ross

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control. product had a defect.
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective and had a hole first time we tried to use it. Amazon would not let us return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D dziuba

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea. But you need a special air pump to go with this float.and I did not know that until we arrived at our destination. Just a heads up.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not really big enough for a medium cooler. just a small 6 pack one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandini

customer_reviews.title: Pros: •Holds one coleman cooler 28qt or two smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: •Holds one coleman cooler 28qt or two smaller coolers wedged together •Has two cords to tie to •Durable, held up rough shallow water with out tearing Cons: •Cords are made to hook quickly only to other Sevylor products •Cup holders do not hold anything bigger than a 12 oz can well This held up well for multiple float trips (mostly tubing, a few with canoes). Did not tear or leak, held a well packed 28qt cooler without problems. After a full summer of use it will still be usable next year.
customer_reviews.author: nik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!!!! Our cooler fit perfectly. It is a huge hit every time we take it out
customer_reviews.author: Bethany_lse

customer_reviews.title: and though my only experience with it was clinging dramatically for a floatation device—then nearly being smothered with it by my best friend—it stayed above water the entire time
customer_reviews.text: my aunt bought this for her pool, and though my only experience with it was clinging dramatically for a floatation device—then nearly being smothered with it by my best friend—it stayed above water the entire time. so i'm giving its floatability a solid A+.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 2 bc it has netting in the middle. I did not see that. I assumed it was plastic or rubber in the middle, thus helping to keep things dry. Also, the cup holders are at an angle. Drinks will spill
customer_reviews.author: Annie Junkins

customer_reviews.title: smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: The float will work well for what its used for but it is smaller than I expected. Also it is on the box that this float is meant to be used for a igloo 28 QT cooler and smaller. I wish the it would have said that on the description.
customer_reviews.author: FireofFury

customer_reviews.title: Don't be fooled by the opaque bottom appearance in the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Mouse over the bottom and it implies that it is opaque solid bottom. In actuality it is a mesh bottom which will get your non-hard bottom coolers wet. Deceiving sales. I will try it in the river tomorrow then send it back.
customer_reviews.author: R. alliss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Tubing
customer_reviews.text: I live in a town highly known for it's river tubing. Seeing as I didn't want to drop $15 every time I needed a cooler float, I bought this puppy. Fantastic purchase. It inflates very quickly and hasn't developed a hole or anything yet. My friends that don't have their own tubes with cupholders love using the cupholders on each of the corners. I have used it with a cooler filled with 10lb of ice, 18 beers, food, etc and it held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: If you want to hang out in the pool drinking beer, but don't want to go all the way to the edge to get a refill this is the product for you. I was disappointed that I needed to provide my own air, tho. I assumed it would be filled with Amazon air.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Best thing invented for summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought a cooler with the dimensions the box specified -- fit perfectly and snug. Definitely try to use a real air compressor to get it fully inflated so that when the float hits the cool water, it doesn't get saggy. And those Sevylor clips are very clever -- worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: WorkerBee

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to do a river float for our small ice chests, it stayed inflated the whole time and was extremely easy to use! I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Naddy

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly...not tippy at all! We happened to have that size cooler in the house so it was a no brainer to purchase. We floated down a natural spring in Florida with it and it was perfect. Tied it up to our tubes and off we went. What I like is that it's not as big as others out there on the market. Don't worry about the size...it's perfect and the cup holders are nice and tight. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

product_meta.title: Sevylor Cooler Float
product_meta.description: Let a few cold drinks and a couple tasty snacks drift with you on the lake when you've got a Sevylor Cooler Float by your side. The innovative inflatable table is designed to fit a Coleman 28-quart cooler and also includes four cup holders to keep drinks close. The float will stay close to you and your other Sevylor lake floats with two Snap 'N' Stay system that hooks any Sevylor float to another. However long you're out on the water, the Airtight System is guaranteed not to leak, and the Mini Double Lock Valve that makes for easy inflation is also great for deflation when it's time to move the party back on to shore.
feature_bullets: Four Cup Holders Keep Drinks Close
Durable 10-Gauge Pvc With A Thick 12-Gauge Pvc Bottom
Two Snap 'N' Stay Cords Connect The Float To Other Sevylor Floats
Mini Double Lock Fast Valve For Easy Inflation, Deflation And Added Leak Protection
